scripts.spec:build: browserify -d -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] -t aliasify --node -u 'node_modules/**/*' -x 'react/addons' -x 'react/lib/ReactContext' -x 'react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment' `find src/ -iname '*\.spec\.js*'` -o playa.spec.js
scripts.spec:lint-build-and-run: npm run spec:lint && npm run spec:build && npm run spec
scripts.spec:watch-faster: watchify -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] -t aliasify --node -u 'node_modules/**/*' -x 'react/addons' -x 'react/lib/ReactContext' -x 'react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment' `find src/ -iname '*\.spec\.js*'` -o 'playa.spec.js' & onchange playa.spec.js -- npm run spec
scripts.js:build: browserify -d -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] -t aliasify src/main.js --fast -o playa.js
scripts.js:build:prod: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] -t aliasify ./src/main.js | uglifyjs -c > playa.js
scripts.js:watch-faster: watchify -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] -t aliasify src/main.js -o playa.js
scripts.style:lint: echo "CSS lint is still TODO" && exit 0
scripts.style:collect-modules-and-build: npm run style:collect-modules && npm run style:build
scripts.style:collect-modules-and-build:prod: npm run style:collect-modules && npm run style:build:prod
scripts.style:collect-modules: echo "/* Modules collected on `date` */" > ./style/modules.scss && find ./src -iname '*.scss.module' -exec echo '@import "{}";' >> ./style/modules.scss \;
scripts.lint: npm run js:lint && npm run style:lint
scripts.build: npm run js:build && npm run style:collect-modules-and-build
scripts.build:prod: npm run js:build:prod && npm run style:collect-modules-and-build:prod
scripts.lint-and-build: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.watch: npm run js:watch & npm run style:watch &
scripts.watch-faster: npm run js:watch-faster & npm run style:watch &
scripts.start: npm run lint-and-build && { npm run serve & npm run watch-faster & }
